results.title: The efficacy of cibenzoline for reducing the left ventricular pressure gradient of hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy: A case report.
results.text_hl: A 46 year-old man with @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic obstructive cardiomyopathy@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@HOCM@@@) was referred to this clinic complaining of @DISEASE_Dyspnea @DISEASE_MESH:D004417 @@@shortness of breath@@@.
